data.text:
The Uma Musume of Tracen Academy, Grass Wonder included, 
had come to the beach for training camp.
data.processed:
󠁿The Uma Musume of Tracen Academy, Grass Wonder included, 
󠁿had come to the beach for training camp.

data.text: Good morning, Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Good morning, Trainer-san.

data.text:
Fufuu, to think that everyday right after waking up we'd start 
training, there's no better environment than this, is there～?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, to think that everyday right after waking up we'd start 
󠁿training, there's no better environment than this, is there～?

data.text:
This training camp is an important opportunity, 
so I plan to take full advantage of it to grow.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿This training camp is an important opportunity, 
󠁿so I plan to take full advantage of it to grow.

data.text: And so, I look forward to you continuing to accompany me♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿And so, I look forward to you continuing to accompany me♪

data.text: And so the training camp started―
data.processed: 󠁿And so the training camp started―

data.text:
Haa…… Huu…… huu…… 
……I'm not running…… haa…… the way I want to……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Haa…… Huu…… huu…… 
󠁿……I'm not running…… haa…… the way I want to……

data.text:
Trainer-san, I'm going to…… run one more, okay? 
I haven't gotten…… satisfactory results…… Huu……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, I'm going to…… run one more, okay? 
󠁿I haven't gotten…… satisfactory results…… Huu……

data.text:
It seems like Grass Wonder herself feels she 
hasn't reached the goals she set for herself.
data.processed:
󠁿It seems like Grass Wonder herself feels she 
󠁿hasn't reached the goals she set for herself.

data.text:
However, maybe due to fatigue, her form had started to 
deteriorate. If she continued it might lead to injury―

choices.text: Let's call it a day here

data.processed:
󠁿However, maybe due to fatigue, her form had started to 
󠁿deteriorate. If she continued it might lead to injury―

data.text: I'm fine……I can still keep running……?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿I'm fine……I can still keep running……?

data.text: At this…… training camp I need to……
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You can't run more than this!
You can't run more than this!

data.processed: 󠁿At this…… training camp I need to……

data.text:
……Understood. Let's return to the camp lodgings. 
Good work, Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿……Understood. Let's return to the camp lodgings. 
󠁿Good work, Trainer-san.

data.text:
Grass Wonder acquiesced quite quickly, 
and headed back to the lodgings.
data.processed:
󠁿Grass Wonder acquiesced quite quickly, 
󠁿and headed back to the lodgings.

data.text: Later that day, at night―
data.processed: 󠁿Later that day, at night―

data.text: Trainer-san, so you were here～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san, so you were here～.

data.text:
I heard there was a summer festival nearby, 
so I came to invite you, Trainer-san. Want to go together?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿I heard there was a summer festival nearby, 
󠁿so I came to invite you, Trainer-san. Want to go together?

data.text:
I thought she would be upset since I had stopped her 
training, but Grass Wonder seemed the same as usual.
data.processed:
󠁿I thought she would be upset since I had stopped her 
󠁿training, but Grass Wonder seemed the same as usual.

data.text:
Fufuu, when it comes to summer in Japan, you can't help but think 
of festivals. Let's go enjoy some culture.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Fufuu, when it comes to summer in Japan, you can't help but think 
󠁿of festivals. Let's go enjoy some culture.

data.text:
While I prefer a quieter place for a walk, this liveliness 
is precisely what makes a festival nice, isn't it?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿While I prefer a quieter place for a walk, this liveliness 
󠁿is precisely what makes a festival nice, isn't it?

data.text:
Ah, look at that. They're selling a candy that 
looks like a whole watermelon. Trainer-san, you 
made sure not to eat anything yet, right?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I can't eat all of that……!

data.processed:
󠁿Ah, look at that. They're selling a candy that 
󠁿looks like a whole watermelon. Trainer-san, you 
󠁿made sure not to eat anything yet, right?

data.text:
Fufu, it was a joke. 
Let's not go too wild with our fun♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Fufu, it was a joke. 
󠁿Let's not go too wild with our fun♪

data.text:
The two of us were wandering around the various stalls when 
Grass Wonder stopped in front of the Shooting Gallery.
data.processed:
󠁿The two of us were wandering around the various stalls when 
󠁿Grass Wonder stopped in front of the Shooting Gallery.

data.text:
Oh～. 
That cat plushie is really cute, isn't it～?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Oh～. 
󠁿That cat plushie is really cute, isn't it～?

data.text:
Oh, Uma Musume Lady, 
wanna give it a shot?
data.name: Stall Owner
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, Uma Musume Lady, 
󠁿wanna give it a shot?

data.text:
Well let's see～…… 
Trainer-san, I'm going to try it.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Well let's see～…… 
󠁿Trainer-san, I'm going to try it.

data.text:
The mild-mannered Grass Wonder now held a gun. As I watched over 
her, it felt like a huge gap between her normal character―
data.processed:
󠁿The mild-mannered Grass Wonder now held a gun. As I watched over 
󠁿her, it felt like a huge gap between her normal character―

data.text: (Click――Pop……)
data.processed: 󠁿(Click――Pop……)

data.text: I did it～! I got it in one shot♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿I did it～! I got it in one shot♪

data.text: That was surprising! Congrats little lady!
data.name: Stall Owner
data.processed: 󠁿That was surprising! Congrats little lady!

data.text:
Thank you very much～. 
……Alright, I still have a few more shots left, huh?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you very much～. 
󠁿……Alright, I still have a few more shots left, huh?

data.text: (Click――Pop…… Click――Pop……)
data.processed: 󠁿(Click――Pop…… Click――Pop……)

data.text: Oh my, I've got so many plushies now.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Oh my, I've got so many plushies now.

data.text:
I-I'm flabbergasted. Getting each item you 
aimed for in one hit…… almost like a hitman!
data.name: Stall Owner
data.processed:
󠁿I-I'm flabbergasted. Getting each item you 
󠁿aimed for in one hit…… almost like a hitman!

data.text:
Oh, I'm nothing so ruthless. 
I'm always tranquil…… my heart is always at harmony♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, I'm nothing so ruthless. 
󠁿I'm always tranquil…… my heart is always at harmony♪

data.text:
The festival was fun, wasn't it♪～? 
Even though it's a training camp, it's important to let loose.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You wanted to run though, right?

data.processed:
󠁿The festival was fun, wasn't it♪～? 
󠁿Even though it's a training camp, it's important to let loose.

data.text: Fufuu, it's true I felt a little like that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu, it's true I felt a little like that.

data.text:
After all, there are plenty of things that I don't 
want to compromise on, and I have no plans on changing 
anything I've already decided on.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿After all, there are plenty of things that I don't 
󠁿want to compromise on, and I have no plans on changing 
󠁿anything I've already decided on.

data.text:
But, the reason I can be so stubborn, 
is because Trainer-san is there to support me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿But, the reason I can be so stubborn, 
󠁿is because Trainer-san is there to support me.

data.text:
Times when I truly need to stop, 
you'll step in to stop me.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I'll do my best to keep supporting you
choices.processed: <size=43>I'll do my best to keep supporting you</size>

choices.text: I'll do my best to keep supporting you
choices.processed: <size=43>I'll do my best to keep supporting you</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Times when I truly need to stop, 
󠁿you'll step in to stop me.

data.text:
Yes, and I'll give it my all to respond to that. 
For the training camp and everything after that, 
I'm looking forward to working with you.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, and I'll give it my all to respond to that. 
󠁿For the training camp and everything after that, 
󠁿I'm looking forward to working with you.

data.text:
The next day, in order to respond to Grass Wonder's 
wishes, I decided to start a new training menu.
data.processed:
󠁿The next day, in order to respond to Grass Wonder's 
󠁿wishes, I decided to start a new training menu.

data.text:
Huu～…… 
Trainer-san, I've finished that long swim～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Huu～…… 
󠁿Trainer-san, I've finished that long swim～.

data.text:
So to reduce the load on my legs, 
we've incorporated some moderate training in the ocean, right?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿So to reduce the load on my legs, 
󠁿we've incorporated some moderate training in the ocean, right?

data.text:
……wait, huh? Is the training over with this? 
It feels strange though, I can still keep running, you know?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿……wait, huh? Is the training over with this? 
󠁿It feels strange though, I can still keep running, you know?

data.text:
Trainer-san, have you made a mistake in 
how much training I should be doing?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, have you made a mistake in 
󠁿how much training I should be doing?

data.text:
『To empathize is to know』…… as I thought, 
Trainer-san really understands me, huh～? Fufuu♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿『To empathize is to know』…… as I thought, 
󠁿Trainer-san really understands me, huh～? Fufuu♪

data.text:
To keep up with Grass Wonder, 
I'd need to follow at breakneck speed.
data.processed:
󠁿To keep up with Grass Wonder, 
󠁿I'd need to follow at breakneck speed.
